articles.description: Besides killing hundreds of thousands of people, COVID-19 is to blame for Denmark’s great mink massacre.
articles.content: The worst-case scenario is a new pandemic, starting all over again out of Denmark, came the words of a grave Kåre Mølbak, director of the Danish health authorities, the State Serum Institute. Accordi… [+7287 chars]

articles.title: UA professor: Arizona could reach COVID-19 "crisis point" after Thanksgiving - Arizona Daily Star
articles.description: As COVID-19 cases rise again in Arizona and Pima County, hospitals could become overburdened once more, leading to another crisis point.
articles.content:
What he thinks is a large driver of the increase in cases is not only pandemic fatigue, where people get more lax on efforts to curb the spread of the virus, but also small gatherings.
